thread.title: Kristin Gill
thread.title_full: Quasar Expeditions reviewed by Kristin Gill

author: Kristin Gill
title: Kristin Gill
text: One of the best trips I have been on. The boat is wonderful, but the wildlife and the staff are even more fabulous! The naturalists are knowledgeable, engaging and enthusiastic. The crew is attentive and fun. And the Galapagos Islands are stunning and not to be missed.
